title: GET_TRAIN_CRUISE_SPEED
content:
0xA4921EF5// GetTrainCruiseSpeed
float GET_TRAIN_CRUISE_SPEED(Vehicle train);Parameters:train: The train handleReturns: The desired cruise speed of the train. Not the speed the train is currently traveling atGets the trains desired speed.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_TRAIN_CRUISE_SPEED
GetTrainCruiseSpeed(vehicle)
